comments.content: Hi Michael, these look fantastic. We only get atayef over in Egypt for Ramadan. We don't get the ricotta version because there is rarely ricotta over here. comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Yep, the recipe in the book blatantly omits the water measurement! I just added enough until it was thin like a crepe batter, distinctly thinner than an American pancake batter. Sorry I didn't measure it, but I think you can suss it out pretty easily.
